CustomField.description: Get the month and year so that a Roll-Up Summary Field can calculate the most recent month. For Account 1
CustomField.formula:
VALUE( IF( ISPICKVAL( Account__c, 'Account 1' ), TEXT( Year__c ), '1970' ) & CASE( Month__c, 'January', '01', 'February', '02', 'March', '03', 'April', '04', 'May', '05', 'June', '06', 'July', '07', 'August', '08', 'September', '09', 'October', '10', 'November', '11', 'December', '12', '01' )
)
CustomField.label: Month/Year Helper Act. 1
